dictionary.name: _code
dictionary.string: "uniform float speed = 3.0;&#000a;uniform float bendFactor = 0.2;&#000a;float height = 1.0 - UV.y;&#000a;float offset = pow(height, 1.5);&#000a;offset *= (sin(TIME / 2 * speed) * bendFactor);&#000a;vec4 normalColor = tex(TEXTURE, fract(vec2(UV.x + offset, UV.y)));&#000a;COLOR = SRC_COLOR * normalColor; //vec4(normalColor, 1);"
